Hero.title: The Quantum Warlock
Hero.subtitle: I entangle qubits and disentangle neural networks with black magic.

About.skills: Cool logos to add colors to this page
About.skills_desc: I've put here a few logos of things I use, or *get by with*. Don't worry too much about suspicious ones.
About.master: Master of Science in Cybersecurity - Institut polytechnique de Paris (IPP).
About.master_desc: May magically transform into a master of mathematics.
About.engineering_school_desc: Telecommunications, cyber security, cloud, information theory, graph theory.
About.thales: Research internship in AI security - Thales
About.thales_desc: Implementations and improvements of state-of-the-art attacks on LLMs (ACG, I-GCG, TAP), and on LLM-based systems (RAG, agents). Development of tools to facilitate research in the field (TransformerLens). Use of interpretability techniques (probes, steering vectors, SAE) to create a new attack class (publication end of January).
About.hackademint: Training, infrastructure and much more... - HackademINT (Télécom SudParis)
About.hackademint_desc: Responsible for training (regular training on Tuesday evenings, and practical work on Thursday afternoons) and infrastructure (Docker, Kubernetes). Creation and organisation of the 404CTF 2023 & 2024. Created challenges in artificial intelligence (adversarial attacks, poisoning, backdoors) and quantum physics (QKD attack).
About.title: Whoami?
About.subtitle: Aka _the quantum warlock, the masked camel, the fanOfThermodynamics, the pipe and clouds engineer, the whale orchestra conductor_, or just **Sckathach**. I'm a french student at Télécom SudParis, and soon, a ML(4SEC) researcher!
About.connect: Social media I use arranged in descending exponential order:
About.background: I love mathematics, physics, graphs theory, AI, cybersecurity, graphs, geopolitics, thermodynamics (yes, I swear), programming, and especially graphs.
About.interests: I'm currently fan of [**mechanistic interpretability**](https://distill.pub/2020/circuits/zoom-in/), but there is a high risk I become fan of [*SLT*](https://metauni.org/slt/) instead.
About.paper: My favorite paper (asof December 2024) : [Toy Models of Superposition](https://transformer-circuits.pub/2022/toy_model/index.html).

Kards.404_content: I finally took the time to refactor, translate, and add a solution to each of my challenges, go check it out!
Kards.riyad_title: (FRENCH ONLY FOR NOW) Riyadh - A simple oasis or the new centre of the world?
Kards.riyad_content: After years of doing analyses on my own, I've taken the plunge! I've written my first article on the Arab world, with a particular focus on Saudi Arabia and its Crown Prince Mohammed ben Salmane.
Kards.migcg_title: Exploring the use of Mechanistic Interpretability to Craft Adversarial Attacks
Kards.migcg_content: Checkout my first project on MI!
